summary: A conversion for Unified UNP HDT Bodyslide of ralfetas's Pampas Set Mod for FO4
descriptionHtml:
[center][i]Version 1.14 - [/i][i]Fixed pants not conforming to body, also combined previous updates[/i][i]
_____________________________________________________
[/i][/center][center] The Pampas (from Quechua pampa, meaning "plain") are fertile South American lowlands, covering more than 750,000 km2 (289,577 sq mi), that include the Argentine provinces of Buenos Aires, La Pampa, Santa Fe, Entre Ríos and Córdoba; most of Uruguay; and the southernmost Brazilian State, Rio Grande do Sul. These vast plains are a natural region only interrupted by the low Ventana and Tandil hills near Bahía Blanca and Tandil (Argentina), with a height of 1,300 m (4,265 ft) and 500 m (1,640 ft), respectively. ([url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pampas]Wikipedia[/url])[/center]

[center][img]https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/a/ae/Pampas_Range.png[/img][/center]
[size=2]
[/size][center][size=2]...That's what this armor was named after. This is a conversion of the awesome [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/19263/?]Pampas Set - CBBE - BodySlide by ralfetas
[/url]Here are some examples of what you can expect:[/size][/center][center][size=2][b][/b][url=http://www.aaa.com][b][/b][/url][url=http://][/url][url=http://www.aaa.com][b]
[/b][/url][b][img]https://s26.postimg.org/iootlb5qh/front001.jpg[/img]
[img]https://s26.postimg.org/i34g2y021/front004.jpg[/img]
[/b][/size][b][size=4][img]https://s26.postimg.org/saie1lww9/front002.jpg[/img]
[img]https://s26.postimg.org/ly38rrtu1/front003.jpg[/img]
[img]https://s26.postimg.org/app23zg09/front006.jpg[/img]
[img]https://s26.postimg.org/j6okewkp5/front005.jpg[/img]

- WHAT'S INCLUDED -[/size]
[/b]10 Bodysuits
Matching Boots (so 10 of them)
1 Top
1 Pair of Pants
All that with at least 8themes, Basic (black), BOS, Gunner, Institute, Minutemen, NukaCola andbVaultTec and Raider and 10 plain colors.[/center]

[center]Let me know if something doesn't work and I'll try to fix it. Nonconstructive criticism not welcome. [/center]

[size=4][center][b]- REQUIREMENTS - [/b][/center][/size][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url], by Hydrogen
HDT physics compatible skeleton(Groovtama's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XPMS Extended[/url] recommended)
The latest [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]Bodyslide[/url][/center]

[size=4][b][center]- INSTALLATION -[/center][/b][/size][list=1]
[*][size=2][size=2]Download and install the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/25/?]Bodyslide and Outfit Studio[/url] utility.[/size][/size]
[*][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2]Download and install this mod (automatically, using NMM or MO, or if manually then [/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][size=2][size=2][size=2]extract the file into Skyrim's Data folder).[/size][/size][/size]
[*][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2]Default body is 7BO so if you use that then [/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][size=2][size=2]stop here and enjoy. If you wish to customize your shape then read on.[/size][/size][/size]
[*][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2]Open the BodySlide utility. Search for "BS - Pampas...".[/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size]
[*][size=2]Tweak the sliders to your liking, or use a preset you have already created.[/size]
[*][size=2]Obtain in game using either the console "help Pampas" (no quotes) or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905/?]AddItemMenu - Ultimate Mod Explorer[/url].[/size]
[/list]

[center][b][size=3]- MODS USED IN SCREENSHOTS -[/size][/b]
[url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/1803-leah-lilith-jewelry/]Leah Lilith Jewelry [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57083/?]HN66 nails[/url] 
[url=http://www.loverslab.com/topic/54989-luxury-collection-for-uunp-hdt-bodyslide-2016119last-update/]Luxury Collection[/url] 
[url=http://www.loverslab.com/topic/55081-my-personal-uunp-hdt-conversion-sets-lastupdate20160125/page-1]CHH Heels[/url][/center]

[center][b][size=4]- CREDITS/THANKS-
[/size][/b][url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/143500174@N07]Agghgahd[/url], [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/143978772@N05/]GodReaper[/url], [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/widowpuppy/]WidowPuppy[/url], [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/124458843@N05/]Sam [/url] and [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/39994399@N04/]Cakesicles[/url] for their awesome screenshots. :D[/center]
[i][center][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/19263/?]Ralfetas[/url] for the original work on the Pampas set and allowing me to release this. This is his concept and hard work. Ask Ralfetas for permissions, not me. 

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686/?]Caliente[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/users/4291759/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4291759/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/users/4291759/?]ousnius[/url] for the Bodyslide and Outfit Studio utility, without which this conversion would never have been attempted.
[/size][/center][/i]
author: blazingsai

Fixed pants not conforming to body (in Bodyslide).
Combined previous updates
